titles: Act made at Aberdeen the nynteenth day of Aprill 1677 years
author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.
Foullerton, John.
notes: Each act signed: Iohn Foullerton, I.P.C.
Place and publisher suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Includes: Another act made at Aberdeen the twentyeth day of April 1677 years.
Reproduction of original in the Aberdeen City Charter Room, (Aberdeen, Scotland).
